setDataNotifier

public void setDataNotifier(IBeaconDataNotifier notifier)
This notifier is a variant of the RangingNotifier. If ranging has been started and this notifier is set, then for each ranged iBeacon detected, iBeacon data will be fetched from the cloud. When the data are available, the notifier will be called. This notifier is very similar to the RangeNotifier except that when called, iBeacon data will be available. Note that because a server call is necessary to fetch this data (if it has not already been received), the DataNotifier callback may come a few seconds after the iBeacon is detected, depending on network response times.

Parameters:
notifier -
